name: Australis 2.0 [Beta]
description: A Firefox userstyle that makes minor theme changes throughout the UI using the Mozilla's Australis design guidelines for consistency. This is a fork of Blinky's "Firefox Australis Windows 8 Appearance" (https://userstyles.org/styles/96014/firefox-australis-windows-8-appearance). All credit goes to him first! This theme is only optimized for Windows. Restart the browser to see complete changes. Other styles created: Australis 2.0 [Developer Edition - Dark] https://userstyles.org/styles/134572/australis-2-0-developer-edition-dark Australis 2.0 [Android Edition] TBA
